nchack.NCData.vertical_interp¶

NCData.vertical_interp(self, vert_depths=None, cores=1)¶

Verticaly interpolate a tracker based on given depths

Parameters

  • vert_depths (list) -- list of depths to vertical interpolate to

  • cores (int) -- Number of cores to use if files are processed in parallel. Defaults to non-parallel operation

Returns

Reduced tracker with the surface level

Return type

nchack.NCTracke
